title: 2557 N. Halsted Ave. Unit 3
posting_body: This stunning building features balconies and bay windows and is located less than half a mile away from DePaul University.
It is steps from numerous retail establishments, including everything from Best Buy and Home Depot to locally owned boutique shops.
Hip restaurants and cool bars are abundant all up and down Halsted Street and nearby Lincoln Avenue.
Lincoln Park’s biking and running paths, tennis courts, baseball and softball diamonds, and beaches are just five blocks east.

Transportation is very convenient; the Fullerton CTA train station which services the Red, Brown, and Express Purple Lines is four blocks to the northwest and the #22 Clark Street bus which goes down to the loop is two blocks east.
Advertised rent prices are subject to change without notice!
